history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?For example, you can say I'm going to Squirrel Hill
USER Hilton Garden Inn
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to hilton garden inn pittsburgh downtown?
USER No, I'm going to the one at Pittsburgh University Place.
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to hilton garden inn pittsburgh university place?
USER right
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER Airport
TTS Did you say that you were leaving from pittsburgh international airport?
USER Yes.
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER At 4 p.m.
TTS Okay, travelling at 04:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 4 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/>If you would like to go by driving instead, please say start over, and then choose driving directions.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 28X <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Forbes avenue at McKee Pl.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 4:30pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
